page.title: 19TRADE IN LINTON
page.content: The busiest shop was the Newsagents with customers staying under 15 minutes and spending less than Â£5.It is most important for daily use. The Co-op amd V.G seemed to have the same number of customers,most of these were female.Most of the shoppers are local people and aged 55-60 years.They were usually shopping for themselves rather than a family.They used the shops several times a week especially Friday and Saturday. We think that the younger adults with families shop in a larger town or shopping centre.Because it is cheaper and they could get a larger range of goods. Linton is not a very important trade centre but it does have a small estate agents,insurance office and betting office.
